channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Appoints Fox News Hosts to Kennedy Center Board
item.description: President Donald Trump has appointed two Fox News Channel (FNC) hosts to serve on the board of the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

item.title: Tesla Shares Have Declined Each Week Since Musk Went to D.C.
item.description: Stock offered by billionaire Elon Musk's Tesla has taken a big price hit over the past seven weeks, CNBC reported.

item.title: Georgia Republicans don’t rule out Senate bids as popular GOP governor remains undecided
item.description: Georgia House Reps. Rich McCormick and Mike Collins left the door open to potential Senate bids in 2026 if Gov. Kemp doesn't run himself.

item.title: Congress unveils spending plan after Trump calls on Republicans to avoid government shutdown
